tool_description: Generates random avatar pictures with transparent backgrounds. PNG output format. Test the endpoint!
name: 🔴 RANDOM AVATAR 🔴 Daddy
title: 🔴 RANDOM AVATAR 🔴 Daddy

api_list.name: Random Avatar
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-avatar-daddy.p.rapidapi.com/rnd"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-avatar-daddy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
